REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0119 reute b f BC-BANK-OF-FRANCE-TO-HOL 04-09 0078

TEXT.TITLE: BANK OF FRANCE TO HOLD MONEY MARKET TENDER TODAY
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of France said it has invited offers of first category paper today for a money market intervention tender. Money market operators were divided over whether the Bank of France will use to occasion to cut its intervention rate, which has stood at 7-3/4 pct since March 9. Some thought a price cut unlikely while others said there was room for a further 1/4 point cut by the bank. REUTER
